description: Analyzer for BR-02 Raw Material Specification

MaterialName.description: Material/product name shown on the specification or CoA.

MaterialCode.description: Supplier or internal material code/identifier if present.

QuantifiableTests.description: Table of quantifiable tests with numeric ranges and units (e.g., pH, viscosity, assay). One entry per test row.

Test.description: Exact test name/parameter as listed (e.g., 'pH (10% in ethanol)', 'Viscosity (25 C)').

Method.description: Test method or standard (e.g., ASTM, USP, ISO, SOP).

UOM.description: Unit of measure for the result (e.g., mPaÂ·s, g/mL, nD, cfu/g). Use the unit printed in the table.

Min.description: Numeric minimum of the acceptable range, if provided. Ignore text like 'N/A'. Strip symbols and use '.' as decimal.

Max.description: Numeric maximum of the acceptable range, if provided. Ignore 'N/A'.

Typical.description: Typical/target value as printed. Preserve text such as '<10' or '~180' if not a pure number.

Test.description: Name of the qualitative test (e.g., 'GMO Declaration').

Notes.description: Free-text notes or remarks sections (e.g., storage, sampling, shelf life). Concatenate if multiple note blocks exist.
